text: I think “winning” looks like “finding a way for minorities and queer people to exist on social media without having to deal with constant, vicious harassment from subpar intellects like Bari Weiss and Libs of TikTok,” actually
And for once it feels within reach
I think what we have here is a garden variety free speech absolutist.
We don’t want to put up with this endless shit anymore and perhaps we finally have a chance not to be forced to

That sword cuts both ways. Us conservatives are trying to find a way to exist on social media without having to deal with the subpar intellects that adhere to woke Marxism.

And the only thing Libs of TikTok does is hold up a mirror to the absurdities of the woke.

The interesting question is if there's a way to achieve that without it being a small closed forum.

I'm excited to see the pluggable moderation options and will gladly subscribe to one that eliminates LoTT and other dunk types.
